contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Vodafone Introduces 2 For 1 Cinema Tickets With Vodafone Tuesdays

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Vodafone Qatar has launched Vodafone Tuesdays which allows customers to enjoy two cinema tickets for the price of one.
Vodafone customers will be able to watch their favorite block buster movie every Tuesday and take along a friend or family member free of charge. Vodafone Tuesdays will be available at the Cinemas in City Centre and Villaggio malls.

For Vodafone customers to take advantage of Vodafone Tuesdays, they can simply download the Vodafone EntertainME application and avail of this offer to enjoy great times with friends and families. The Vodafone EntertainME application link can be found on www.vodafone.qa/tuesdays. Vodafone customers can also download the app directly from the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

Once Vodafone customers have downloaded the EntertainME app they can quickly and easily generate the Vodafone Tuesdays code. Customers will then need to show this code at the Cinema ticket counters and get access to the offer immediately.

On Vodafone Tuesdays, Vodafone Red customers will be treated like VIPs. With a VIP queue clearly marked for Red customers only and all Red customers can now skip the queue.
